title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk; tempera
Technique: painted on plain weave
description: Textile fragment. Cream-colored (originally white) silk with design painted in polychrome tempera. Design of vertical repeat of flower wreaths and garlands, held in place by ribbons, and with birds and insects scattered through the spaces.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk; tempera
Technique: painted on plain weave. Gift of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-25-16.
